Activity – The Router Boot Process

Drag each of the steps on the left to appropriate field in the table on the right to show the router boot process order.

Load the IOS (operating system file for the router – loaded into RAM after Bootstrap finds the IOS
file to be used)
<font color="#393536">Perform POST (hardware check – performed by built-in ROM chip)</font>
<font color="#393536">Load the Configuration File from FLASH (NVRAM), a TFTP Server OR Go into Setup Mode (to create a Configuration file)</font>
<font color="#393536">Load Bootstrap (copied from ROM to RAM – locates the IOS)</font>
